apihelp-homepagequestionstore-summary: Obtain formatted questions posted via homepage modules
apihelp-homepagequestionstore-param-ques: The format to return the questions in, e.g. HTML.
apihelp-homepagequestionstore-param-stor: The storage location of the questions.
apihelp-homepagequestionstore-param-user: The user ID to obtain questions for.
apihelp-growthsetmentor-summary: Set user's mentor. Change will be publicly logged.
apihelp-query+growthimagesuggestiondata-: Fetch associated [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/wikitech:Add_Image image suggestion data], if available
Task type ID (to specify whether to fetch data for top-level or section-level image recommendations)
growthexperiments-homepage-imagesuggesti: Task type ID '$1' was not found in the wiki's configuration.
apihelp-growthinvalidateimagerecommendat:
Calling this API will:

* Reset the [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/wikitech:Add_Image "hasrecommendation:image" weighted tag] for the article, so the article is no longer returned in search results for image suggestions.

* Add the article to a short-lived cache, which the [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:GrowthExperiments GrowthExperiments] extension's ImageRecommendationFilter consults to decide if the article should be excluded from the user's suggested edits queue when accessed on [[Special:Homepage]] or via the [[Special:ApiHelp/query+growthtasks|action=query&list=growthtasks]] API.

* Generate and send an event to EventGate to the [https://schema.wikimedia.org/#!/secondary/jsonschema/mediawiki/page/image-suggestions-feedback image-suggestion-feedback stream]. This allows improvements in the image suggestion pipeline, as the code in the pipeline can account for user feedback when generating recommendations.

Further reading: [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Growth/Personalized_first_day/Structured_tasks/Add_an_image mediawiki.org]
Title of the article the image recommendation task is for
The unprefixed filename for the image recommendation, e.g. <kbd>Foo.jpg</kbd>
The title of the section the image recommendation is for, e.g. <kbd>History</kbd>
The 1-based index of the section the image recommendation is for, e.g. <kbd>3</kbd>
